channel.title: Hikes on Shelter's House
channel.description: Recent content in Hikes on Shelter's House

item.title: A busy relaxing week
item.description: It’s been so gorgeous here lately, that it’s hard to believe that a week ago everything was covered in ice! We had a nice day, and right as the sun was setting, starting getting some drizzle. Well, it all turned to ice and our walk that night and the next morning was treacherous. I am officially in the last week of the January 2017 Tone It Up Challenge! I’m loving it, and I plan to keep it up afterwards.
